title: White Embroidered Cotton Midi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a white cotton midi dress with delicate tonal floral embroidery across bodice and hem, short puff sleeves, round neckline, fitted waist, A-line skirt, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims
techpack: White cotton voile midi dress with tonal floral embroidery on bodice and hem. Short puff sleeves with elasticated cuffs, round neckline finished with bias binding. Fitted waist with self-fabric tie, invisible side zipper closure. Fully lined in lightweight cotton. Hem finished with embroidered border.
provenance: Designed by in-house team combining trending white palette with embroidery detailing for a commercial-ready summer dress.
design_text:
White Embroidered Cotton Midi Dress (WD-EMB-001)
Colors: white, ivory, soft cream
Fabrics: cotton voile, cotton lining
Prints/Patterns: tonal floral embroidery
Garment Type: dress
Silhouette: A-line
Sleeves: short puff sleeves
Neckline: round neckline
Length: midi
Style / Fit: f, i, t, t, e, d,  , b, o, d, i, c, e,  , w, i, t, h,  , f, l, a, r, e, d,  , s, k, i, r, t
Trims & details: invisible side zipper, embroidered hem border, self-fabric waist tie
Techpack: available
